server.proxy

Interface IProxyMoveAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IProxyDevCardCommands, IProxyPlayingCommands
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProxy

    public interface IProxyMoveAPI
extends IProxyPlayingCommands, IProxyDevCardCommands
    Contains the commands/actions that you can take for a game that your are currently in. This requires a Cookie.

    This interface is used by IProxy.
    Author:
    Cache Staheli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientModel acceptTrade(AcceptTradeCommand acceptTrade)
      Tells the server to accept/reject the trade offered.
      ClientModel discardCards(DiscardCardsCommand discardCards) 
      ClientModel rollNumber(RollNumberCommand rollNumber)

      • Methods inherited from interface server.proxy.IProxyPlayingCommands

        buildCity, buildRoad, buildSettlement, buyDevCard, finishTurn, maritimeTrade, offerTrade, robPlayer

      • Methods inherited from interface server.proxy.IProxyDevCardCommands

        monopoly, monument, roadBuilding, soldier, yearOfPlenty

    • Method Detail

      • sendChat

        ClientModel sendChat(SendChatCommand sendChat)
        Tells the server to send a chat.
        Parameters:
        sendChat - sendChat command object.
        Returns:
        updated Game model after the command is executed.
        Pre-Conditions:
        All /move/* methods also have a common pre­condition in that they assume that the caller has already logged in to the server and joined a game.
        Post-Conditions:
        The chat contains your message at the end.

      • rollNumber

        ClientModel rollNumber(RollNumberCommand rollNumber)
        Rolls the dice.
        Parameters:
        rollNumber - rollNumber command object.
        Returns:
        updated Game model after the command is executed.
        Pre-Conditions:
        • All /move/* methods also have a common pre­condition in that they assume that the caller has already logged in to the server and joined a game.
        • It is your turn.
        • The client model’s status is ‘Rolling’
        Post-Conditions:
        The client model’s status is now in ‘Discarding’ or ‘Robbing’ or ‘Playing’

      • acceptTrade

        ClientModel acceptTrade(AcceptTradeCommand acceptTrade)
        Tells the server to accept/reject the trade offered.
        Parameters:
        acceptTrade - acceptTrade command object.
        Returns:
        updated Game model after the command is executed.
        Pre-Conditions:
        • You have been offered a domestic trade
        • To accept the offered trade, you have the required resources
        Post-Conditions:
        • If you accepted, you and the player who offered swap the specified resources.
        • If you declined, no resources are exchanged.
        • The trade offer is removed.

      • discardCards

        ClientModel discardCards(DiscardCardsCommand discardCards)
        Parameters:
        discardCards - discardCards command object.
        Returns:
        updated Game model after the command is executed.
        Pre-Conditions:
        • The status of the client model is 'Discarding.'
        • You have over 7 cards.
        • You have the cards you're choosing to discard.
        Post-Conditions:
        • You gave up the specified resources.
        • If you're the last one to discard, the client model status changes to 'Robbing.'
